body:
Well, this is an interesting one - whether it qualifies as harassment to strongly dislike someone and keep mentioning your dislike for them.

There's a user who calls me "pedo" every time he sees me. Is it harassment if it's in the third person but not in the second person?
body_html:
Well, this is an interesting one - whether it qualifies as harassment to strongly dislike someone and keep mentioning your dislike for them.

There's a user who calls me "pedo" every time he sees me. Is it harassment if it's in the third person but not in the second person?

body:
Didn’t plan to log back in until compulsory good-faith categorization goes into effect but I will for this thread.

Ruqqus is the anti-reddit. While Reddit unevenly applies deliberately vague content policies to shelter liberals and leftists while purging anything vaguely conservative, Ruqqus does the same but in reverse. We see this time and time again. True, Reddit’s is malicious and top-down suppression by design, whereas Ruqqus’ behavior is just to capitulate to the whining nazis lest they leave before tanking the site like they did to Voat, the effect is the same so the motive is immaterial.

I look forward to the coming tantrums when TM has to re-flair itself to Offensive and be subject to opt-in filters. I’ll be back then. In the meantime, please enjoy the continued nosedive in quality and content comprised entirely of effete sobbing about objectively true and easily demonstrated jewish supremacy.

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/l7km/Va0GIvqQykI)

Remember [when you first joined and had a big tantrum threatening to leave because of a bug](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/13le/so-thats-it-i-guess-certain)? I had to placate you. This has been your whimpering behavior since Day One. Scream, cry, threaten to leave, hide.

All you do is sob and shelter behind bans in your designated safe spaces. You are terrified of conflict, even in the most pathetic sense of the word - anonymous strangers typing words at you. It is nothing but bluster behind digital walls. The term for this is “chickenhawk.”

And still the impotent, empty threats to - oh no 😦- *leave some faggy purple messageboard* if you don’t get your way continue, half a year later.

parent.body:
Remember [when you first joined and had a big tantrum threatening to leave because of a bug](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/13le/so-thats-it-i-guess-certain)? I had to placate you. This has been your whimpering behavior since Day One. Scream, cry, threaten to leave, hide.

All you do is sob and shelter behind bans in your designated safe spaces. You are terrified of conflict, even in the most pathetic sense of the word - anonymous strangers typing words at you. It is nothing but bluster behind digital walls. The term for this is “chickenhawk.”

And still the impotent, empty threats to - oh no 😦- *leave some faggy purple messageboard* if you don’t get your way continue, half a year later.

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/l7ly/dWaFn9IO7RQ)

parent.body:
Didn’t plan to log back in until compulsory good-faith categorization goes into effect but I will for this thread.

Ruqqus is the anti-reddit. While Reddit unevenly applies deliberately vague content policies to shelter liberals and leftists while purging anything vaguely conservative, Ruqqus does the same but in reverse. We see this time and time again. True, Reddit’s is malicious and top-down suppression by design, whereas Ruqqus’ behavior is just to capitulate to the whining nazis lest they leave before tanking the site like they did to Voat, the effect is the same so the motive is immaterial.

I look forward to the coming tantrums when TM has to re-flair itself to Offensive and be subject to opt-in filters. I’ll be back then. In the meantime, please enjoy the continued nosedive in quality and content comprised entirely of effete sobbing about objectively true and easily demonstrated jewish supremacy.

![](https://i.ruqqus.com/comment/l7km/Va0GIvqQykI)

body:
@kek @arkitekt @captainmeta4

Your favouritism against people who cry wolf is really showing. Miikit got banned because milkits feelings got hurt. Yet rape threats over other users are allowed because? And post gives a lot of examples to this. 

Either take decisive and fair action, or take none at all. **"I do not expect the house to fall, but I do expect it will cease to be divided. It will become all one thing or all the other. "**

Many users here, acted in a way that most others would've been banned for it and got scott free. We all know it. There is little meaning in this charade. Those who cry wolf about muh censorship and muh freedom get to enjoy special priviliges in acting bad faith. 

This is what I hate. Your bannability is related to your clout. There is 0 possibility to getting any real punishment if you're popular since you got tens of users to back you up and threaten with many things. This always reminded me of default mods' threats of closing their subs to get their bidding. 

@no_chill is the only reason why I did not delete my account for good this time after cap apologised for doing the right thing. So if I stopped the charade for a second and not spoke as Ashina but myself, all I can say is that this is how we live anyways. A crooked justice where priviliged people cry about their "oppresion" after their narcissism is pointed out, like milkit getting "justice", but lgbt people living under death / rape threats anyways. People telling nochill to grew a skin here never talked about milkits skin. Its only "grow a thick skin" when its not your tribe. 

So its not a surprise to me that "freeze peach" platform creates an echo chamber of mob justice where you only get justice depending on your tribe. 

7th century Arab tribes had a better way of punishing people. 
Get your shit together. 

Note: Yesterday I wanted to prove I would get banned for doing half of the people defended here. But I do not care about proving the obvious.

Didn’t plan to log back in until compulsory good-faith categorization goes into effect but I will for this thread.

Ruqqus is the anti-reddit. While Reddit unevenly applies deliberately vague content policies to shelter liberals and leftists while purging anything vaguely conservative, Ruqqus does the same but in reverse. In the meantime, please enjoy the continued nosedive in quality and content comprised entirely of effete sobbing about objectively true and easily demonstrated jewish supremacy.

parent.body:
@kek @arkitekt @captainmeta4

Your favouritism against people who cry wolf is really showing. Miikit got banned because milkits feelings got hurt. Yet rape threats over other users are allowed because? And post gives a lot of examples to this. 

Either take decisive and fair action, or take none at all. **"I do not expect the house to fall, but I do expect it will cease to be divided. It will become all one thing or all the other. "**

Many users here, acted in a way that most others would've been banned for it and got scott free. We all know it. There is little meaning in this charade. Those who cry wolf about muh censorship and muh freedom get to enjoy special priviliges in acting bad faith. 

This is what I hate. Your bannability is related to your clout. There is 0 possibility to getting any real punishment if you're popular since you got tens of users to back you up and threaten with many things. This always reminded me of default mods' threats of closing their subs to get their bidding. 

@no_chill is the only reason why I did not delete my account for good this time after cap apologised for doing the right thing. So if I stopped the charade for a second and not spoke as Ashina but myself, all I can say is that this is how we live anyways. A crooked justice where priviliged people cry about their "oppresion" after their narcissism is pointed out, like milkit getting "justice", but lgbt people living under death / rape threats anyways. People telling nochill to grew a skin here never talked about milkits skin. Its only "grow a thick skin" when its not your tribe. 

So its not a surprise to me that "freeze peach" platform creates an echo chamber of mob justice where you only get justice depending on your tribe. 

7th century Arab tribes had a better way of punishing people. 
Get your shit together. 

Note: Yesterday I wanted to prove I would get banned for doing half of the people defended here. But I do not care about proving the obvious.
